name: Kirby and the Rainbow Curse
overview: Kirby and the Rainbow Curse is a 2015 platforming video game in the Kirby series developed by HAL Laboratory for the Wii U. The title is a follow-up to the 2005 Nintendo DS title Kirby: Canvas Curse and sees Kirby turned into a ball. As Kirby is only able to roll it's up to the player to use the Wii U's touch screen to draw rainbow lines for Kirby to roll on and help him navigate through the game's levels.
